data.text:
Yes, it was appallingly racist, and rightly condemned.

I don’t know about you, but I once again had two seemingly opposing reactions at the same time: this is shocking and yet, not surprising.  

This wasn’t out of character for Trump. Because he has none. https://t.co/n4PNKXdniL

Wanted to share some exciting news with you. 

I’m endorsing @ericswalwell for Governor. Here’s why: https://t.co/cAhgYscjdG
